title:
Welcome to Links. This is page contains general purpose links I find interesting. You can find even more links by clicking the 'â˜°' button

The links presented, here, to you are very personal to my own interests. However, they may be useful for you!

The main goal is to provide links to mostly open-source and free alternatives to common proprietary and paid services. And of course, share sources of knowledge.

What you will find in this page: Artificial Intelligence: Alternatives to OpenAI, Google and other Big Tech services News: All about technology in general Software: All kinds of GUI and CLI open-source software to save you from subscritions and improve you general workflow. Code: Several links to programming languages simple tutorials, courses and cheatsheets. Lifestyle: Some personal websites about philosophies and well-being. Databases: Perhaps you want to search a huge list of books, software, icons and emojis, and even wallpapers? YouTube: Some music, mostly rock, and tech channels.
